snippet.title: Atari Lynx Longplay [037] Pinball Jam
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: MadMatty

This game has two tables and I try to show as many of the features of each as I can. I wouldn't say it a great game, but as handheld pinball games go, its not that bad. It has all the pinball features you would expect, even multi ball.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
